register.name: TPIDRRO_EL0
register.gui_name: EL0 Read-Only Software Thread ID Register
register.description: Provides a location where software executing at EL1 or higher can store thread identifying information that is visible to software executing at EL0, for OS management purposes...

register.name: TPIDR_EL0
register.gui_name: EL0 Read/Write Software Thread ID Register
register.description: Provides a location where software executing at EL0 can store thread identifying information, for OS management purposes...

register.name: TPIDR_EL1
register.description: Provides a location where software executing at EL1 can store thread identifying information, for OS management purposes...

register.name: TPIDR_EL2
register.description: Provides a location where software executing at EL2 can store thread identifying information, for OS management purposes...

register.name: TPIDR_EL3
register.description: Provides a location where software executing at EL3 can store thread identifying information, for OS management purposes...
